OOC: Yes I have permission to do this.  Contact Dachande if you need to.

::Magmatron/Dragoon::
       Magmatron stood in his office looking around at the utter lack of 
people in the base.  He opened a com signal to all Destrons on Earth.  "All 
Destrons return to the Sulaco immediately!  We must organize our forces for 
our next assault."  He closed his com and sat down.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

       Dragoon looked around the empty room again.  He received the com and 
mumbled something under his breath.  He returned a com to Magmatron.  "I'm 
busy at the IGL tournament remember.  I'll be back when I'm back."

--part1_d7.ac48d0a.28a9b937_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
